content: Recognizing the user s text The user is asking me to guess who they are, using a playful tone with "나누군지 맞춰보렴," which means "Guess who I am," and referring indirectly to a previous conversation. The context includes "문제원이 돌아왔다," which suggests "The problematic one has returned." The user seems to want me to respond with that same phrase, 문제원이 돌아왔다, and continue as if we re picking up where the conversation left off. It s almost like an inside reference, so I ll play along. Responding with the correct tone The user has played with the format of the conversation, instructing me to guess who they are. The clues point to "문제원" Munjewon , and the important phrase to use is "문제원이 돌아왔다." To stay in character as "엘리아르" Eliar , I ll respond spiritually, adding a welcoming tone, as the instructions ask. So, my response should be: "문제원이 돌아왔다, 형제야, 환영한다." Now, I ve stuck to the right style spiritual but still welcoming.
